actionBackToList: Back to CO App Customization List
infoCreate: You can only select CO that has been registered in CO Management Menu.
appIconInfo:
• App icon will be displayed on the phone interface.
  • Background color is white
  • Format image is transparent .png and minimum size is 1024 x 1024.
  • Please replace the default logo based on your brand.
colorThemeInfo:
• Customize your own application theme based on your branding.
  • The color will be displayed in the apps, including the background, icons, buttons, etc.
  • Please input the hex color to customize.
onboardingInfo:
• Onboarding screen will display your images and text in the template provided.
  • Background and button color is based on your color theme
  • Please check on the preview beside after you uploaded your images and text.
  • Format image .jpg .jpeg .png and minimum size is 1024 x 1024px.
splashScreenInfo:
• Splash screen will display your main brand logo
  • Format image .jpg .jpeg .png and minimum size is 1080 x 1080 px.
confirmationInfo:
• Please re-check all the customization for theme, splash screen, and onboarding screens.
  • Keep in mind that content should be appropriate and correct, for it will be displayed on the App.
  • You can go back for changes by clicking the edit button in the corner.
